subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ryan Briscoe held off the Indianapolis 500 winner Scott Dixon and barely slipped through a late-race crash to win Sunday’s IndyCar Series race at the Milwaukee Mile in West Allis, Wis. A week after an embarrassing pit-lane accident that took out Danica Patrick at Indy, Briscoe captured his first victory for Team Penske. Patrick was never in contention, finishing a lap down in ninth.
